scripts.clear: cd ./docs/ && shx rm -rf _sidebar.md config.md index.html LICENSE README.md && cd ../
scripts.copy: shx cp .docsify/* ./docs/ && shx cp ./config/README.md ./docs/config.md && shx cp README.md ./docs/README.md && shx cp LICENSE ./docs/LICENSE
scripts.start: npm run copy && docsify serve docs

hooks.pre-commit: echo 'pre-commit...' && lint-staged && npm run clear && npm run lint-check
